question: who wrote the song the glory of love
api_result: The song "The Glory of Love" was written by Billy Hill in 1936. It has been performed by various artists over the years, but one of the most famous versions was recorded by Benny Goodman and later popularized by The Five Satins in the 1950s. Additionally, the song was notably covered by Peter Cetera in the 1980s for the "Karate Kid Part II" soundtrack.
